tool.name: OGS: appendLinesAlongPolyline
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'appendLinesAlongPolyline'.

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtu). the file containing the input mesh

param.name: geo_file
param.label: geo file
param.help: Input (.gml). the input geometry file which contains polylines

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: Input (.msh). The path to the input gmsh binary file

tool.help: This tool runs the **appendLinesAlongPolyline** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
